name: workspace-shortcuts
description: Organize your workspace with customizable folder shortcuts and logical groups. Quick access to frequently used directories and files with split-view navigation.

viewsWelcome.contents:
No git repository detected.

This panel shows git changes and commit history.

[Open Source Control](command:workbench.view.scm)

üìù **Global Notes**

[Create First Note](command:shortcuts.createGlobalNote)

Quick access notes available everywhere.

**Features:**
‚Ä¢ Create notes accessible from any workspace
‚Ä¢ No group assignment needed
‚Ä¢ Perfect for quick ideas and reminders
‚Ä¢ Automatically saved

üìÅ **Shortcuts Groups**

[Create New Group](command:shortcuts.createLogicalGroup)

Organize your workspace with custom groups.

**Actions:**
‚Ä¢ Create groups to organize files and folders
‚Ä¢ Add files and folders to groups
‚Ä¢ Organize by project, type, or workflow
‚Ä¢ Quick access to frequently used locations

üí¨ **Markdown Comments**

No comments yet.

**To add a comment:**
1. Right-click any .md file ‚Üí 'Open with Review Editor'
2. Select text in the editor
3. Press `Ctrl+Shift+M` (or `Cmd+Shift+M`)
4. Enter your comment in the floating panel

**Features:**
‚Ä¢ Inline comments with visual highlighting
‚Ä¢ Comment bubbles on click
‚Ä¢ Generate AI prompts from comments

ü§ñ **AI Processes**

No AI clarification requests running.

**To start an AI clarification:**
1. Open a markdown file with Review Editor
2. Select text and use 'Ask AI' submenu
3. Running processes will appear here

**Features:**
‚Ä¢ Track running AI requests
‚Ä¢ Cancel long-running processes
‚Ä¢ View process history

workspaceShortcuts.alwaysOpenMarkdownInR.description: Always open Markdown (.md) files in Review Editor View instead of the standard text editor when opening from shortcuts

workspaceShortcuts.sync.enabled.description: Enable cloud synchronization of shortcuts configuration

workspaceShortcuts.sync.autoSync.description: Automatically sync configuration changes to cloud

workspaceShortcuts.sync.syncInterval.description: Periodic sync interval in seconds (0 to disable periodic sync)

enumDescriptions: Use VSCode's built-in Settings Sync (syncs with your Microsoft/GitHub account)
workspaceShortcuts.sync.provider.description: Select the cloud sync provider to use

enumDescriptions: Sync across all workspaces using global state

workspaceShortcuts.markdownComments.show.description: Show resolved comments in the comments panel

workspaceShortcuts.markdownComments.high.description: Background highlight color for open comments (CSS color)

workspaceShortcuts.markdownComments.reso.description: Background highlight color for resolved comments (CSS color)

workspaceShortcuts.aiService.enabled.markdownDescription: **[Preview]** Enable the 'Ask AI' feature in the review editor context menu. This feature allows you to get AI clarification for selected text using Copilot CLI.

enumDescriptions: Send to GitHub Copilot CLI in terminal
GPT 5.1 Codex Max - OpenAI coding model
Gemini 3 Pro Preview - Google's latest model
workspaceShortcuts.aiService.model.description: AI model to use with Copilot CLI. Leave empty to use the default model.

workspaceShortcuts.aiService.prompts.cla.markdownDescription: Prompt template for the **Clarify** action. The selected text and file path will be appended automatically.

workspaceShortcuts.aiService.prompts.goD.default: Please provide an in-depth explanation and analysis of
workspaceShortcuts.aiService.prompts.goD.markdownDescription: Prompt template for the **Go Deeper** action. The selected text and file path will be appended automatically.

workspaceShortcuts.aiService.prompts.cus.markdownDescription: Default prompt template for **Custom Instruction** when user doesn't provide one. The selected text and file path will be appended automatically.

workspaceShortcuts.aiService.workingDire.markdownDescription: Working directory for Copilot CLI execution. Supports `{workspaceFolder}` variable which expands to the workspace folder path. Examples: `{workspaceFolder}`, `{workspaceFolder}/src`, `/absolute/path`. Leave empty to default to `{workspaceFolder}/src` if it exists, otherwise workspace root.

workspaceShortcuts.aiService.commands.markdownDescription:
Custom AI commands for the Ask AI feature. Each command defines an action available in the context menu. Leave empty to use the default commands (Clarify, Go Deeper, Custom).

**Template Variables:**
- `{{selection}}` - The selected text
- `{{file}}` - The file path
- `{{heading}}` - Nearest heading above selection
- `{{context}}` - Surrounding content

prompt.description: Prompt template. Use {{selection}}, {{file}}, {{heading}}, {{context}} for dynamic content. Simple prompts without variables will have selection and file appended automatically.

order.description: Display order in menus (lower numbers appear first)

isCustomInput.description: If true, shows an input dialog for custom instructions

responseLabel.description: Label prefix for AI response comments (e.g., 'ü§ñ **AI Response:**')

workspaceShortcuts.codeReview.rulesFolde.markdownDescription: Path to folder containing code review rule files (relative to workspace root). Rule files should be markdown files describing coding standards and guidelines.

workspaceShortcuts.codeReview.rulesPatte.markdownDescription: Glob pattern for rule files within the rules folder. Files are loaded alphabetically, so prefix with numbers (e.g., `01-naming.md`) to control order.

workspaceShortcuts.codeReview.promptTemp.default: Review the following code changes against the provided coding rules. Identify violations and suggest fixes.
workspaceShortcuts.codeReview.promptTemp.markdownDescription: Prompt template for code review. This text appears at the beginning of the prompt, followed by the rules and diff.

enumDescriptions: Show in AI Processes panel - Track progress and view results in the AI Processes tree view
Copy to clipboard - Copy the prompt to clipboard for use with external AI tools
Open in editor - Send to Copilot CLI and open the result in a new editor tab
workspaceShortcuts.codeReview.outputMode.markdownDescription: Output mode for code review results.

view/item/context.when: view == shortcutsView && (viewItem == logicalGroupItem_file || viewItem == file) && resourceExtname == .md

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run copy-fixtures
scripts.copy-fixtures: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});for(const f of fs.readdirSync(src)){const s=path.join(src,f),d=path.join(dest,f);fs.statSync(s).isDirectory()?copyDir(s,d):fs.copyFileSync(s,d);}}copyDir('src/test/fixtures','out/test/fixtures');"
